issue.title: [CF 465] Raging Blow Enrage Requirement
issue.body:
Hello, it is not an error I'm reporting, but rather an enhancement issue. What i want the Raging Blow icon to do is to be grayed out when im not enraged. I.e. I cant use the ability. Also i want it to be dim when i haven't enough rage, but I think there is already a setting for that. Hope you will implement the setting since it will help me as a fury warrior.


> Posted by CurseForge user Miltiwarr | Imported from CurseForge issue #465 | Raw

comments.body:
What you are actually asking for the the ability to color an icon if its conditions fail. I will think about this because I am not sure if it is something that I would like to implement.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

You could also just use the option I highlighted in this screenshot to get almost the exact desired result: http://i.imgur.com/XOZok.jpg

This will make the icon partially transparent instead of greying it out. Here's an example icon:

^1^T^SManaCheck^B ^SShowTimer^B ^SConditionAlpha^N0.5 ^SShowWhen^Salways ^SType^Scooldown ^SUnAlpha^N0.5 ^SShowTimerText^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SBUFFDUR ^SOperator^S|= ^SName^SEnrage ^t^N2^T ^SType^SBUFFDUR ^SOperator^S|= ^SName^SBerserker`Rage ^SAndOr^SOR ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SEnabled^B ^SName^SRaging`Blow ^t^N50303^S`| ^Sicon^^

@ Cybeloras: I think what Miltiwarr might be getting at here is that TMW doesn't check for enrages when determining whether Raging Blow is "usable". It just checks the cooldown.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

Oh, I figured that the enrage requirement was covered by it being a reactive ability. I suggested to add a condition and have the alpha dim on his post over on the Curse page, but it seems that Miltiwarr would like the icon to be able to be grayed out instead of have a reduced alpha.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Is this still an issue for you? If so, please respond within 1 week. If you don't respond, I will assume that the issue has been resolved or you just don't care that much anymore. Sorry for delaying this for 5 months.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Closing ticket. If you still need help, please comment here and I will reopen the ticket.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
